Name: Summer Rose Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: STIR first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. POUR grenadine into the centre of the drink. This should settle to form a red layer in the base of the glass.
Review: Unless you've a sweet tooth don't mix the red and white layers - sip from the chocolate and lychee top and stop when you hit red.
History: Created in 2003 by Davide Lovison at Isola Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Summer Rose Cocktail contains 222 calories
